@@ -5440,1 +5440,1 @@
-            <explanation>The following option flags are or will be deprecated. <ul><li>-XX:+UseParallelOldGC: Deprecated in Java 14.</li><li>-XX:+UnlockCommercialFeatures: Deprecated in Java 11.</li></ul> Deprecated option flags should be avoided. In some cases they enable legacy code and in other cases they are ignored completely. They will usually be removed in a later Java release.</explanation>
+            <explanation>The following option flags are or will be deprecated. <ul><li>-XX:+UseParallelOldGC: Deprecated in Java 14, ignored in Java 15, and removed in Java 16.</li><li>-XX:+UnlockCommercialFeatures: Deprecated in Java 11.</li></ul> Deprecated option flags should be avoided. In some cases they enable legacy code and in other cases they are ignored completely. They will usually be removed in a later Java release.</explanation>
